snippet: There was destruction all along the New Jersey coastline, longtime restaurants and beach clubs face long and costly repairs, but the residents have an overwhelming belief that the area will come back stronger.
abstract: Point Pleasant Beach Journal; Hurricane Sandy caused widespread destruction all along the New Jersey coastline, and longstanding businesses like restaurants and beach clubs face long and costly repairs; many residents express feelings of shellshock coupled with a determination to rebuild and restore the fabled Jersey Shore.
lead_paragraph: There was destruction all along the New Jersey coastline, longtime restaurants and beach clubs face long and costly repairs, but the residents have an overwhelming belief that the area will come back stronger.

headline.print_headline: A Shared Determination to Rebuild and Restore the Jersey Shore
headline.seo: At the Jersey Shore a Shared Determination to Rebuild and Restore
headline.main: A Shared Determination to Rebuild and Restore the Jersey Shore
